# Appendix D: Datasets Description {#sec-appendix-d .unnumbered}

## Coming Soon

This appendix will describe all datasets used in the course:

- Data structure and variables
- Source and collection methods
- Appropriate analyses
- Access information (CSV files in `/Datasets` folder)

Datasets span various livestock species:
- Dairy cattle (milk yield, lactation curves)
- Beef cattle (growth, carcass traits)
- Swine (litter size, growth rate)
- Poultry (egg production, meat yield)
- Sheep (fleece weight, lamb growth)
